p: The monoterpenes borneol, α-pinene, p-cymene, camphor, and camphene, were the main compounds found in S. multicaulis in the present study (Table 2). α-pinene, borneol, camphor, and camphene are also main compounds reported in other studies of S. multicaulis (e.g., Rustaiyan et al., 1999; Tepe et al., 2004; Morteza-Semnani et al., 2005; Bagci and Kocak, 2008; Karamian et al., 2013; Hatipoglu et al., 2016) in addition to 1,8-cineole, eucalyptol, bornyl acetate, and sesquiterpenes such as ß-caryophyllene and germacrene-D.
